description: This file defines a function to generate a directory structure and placeholder files for a Page Object Model (POM) scaffold used in automated tests. It creates a 'pom' directory with an __init__.py and base_page.py, establishing a minimal framework for test page objects.

classes.name: BasePage
classes.description: A minimal placeholder class for a web page, to be extended with real Selenium interactions.

methods.name: str build_pom_scaffold(requirements: List[Dict], base_dir: str)
methods.description: Creates a directory structure for a Page Object Model scaffold, including __init__.py and base_page.py with a placeholder class for web page interactions.
